reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Reinforcing the collaboration for a better response to HIV and TB in Mozambique

description.narrative: Mozambique - TB/HIV - Fundação para o Desenvolvimento da Comunidade - FDC. This program has the following goals: Reduce the mortality from HIV in TB patients (by HTC and provison of early ART to all). Reduce the mortality from TB in HIV infected persons (by ICF and early TB treatment to all with TB). Reduce by 50% the number of new HIV infections by 2017 against the 2013 estimates. The objectives of this program are: Outreach key populations with comprehensive HIV/TB package of services (Female sex workers, migrant population, MSM, Youth and Adolescents). Increase awareness, distribute and promote consistent use of condoms and lubricants. Increase targeted HIV testing for the general population, pregnant women, and key populations

title.narrative: Coverage / Output indicator for MOZ-C-FDC
KP OVP-other 7: Number of follow up contacts with Adult women (20-49)
KP SW-other 1: Number and percentage of female sex workers reached with the defined service package
KP SW-other 4: Number and percentage of truck drivers reached with the defined service package
YP-other 3: Number and percentage of young girls (15-19) reached with the defined service package
KP SW-other 3: Number of follow up contacts with female sex workers
KP OVP-other 1: Number and percentage of miners reached with the defined service package
YP-other 4: Number of follow up contacts with young girls (15-19)
KP OVP-other 3: Number and percentage of company employees reached with the defined service package
KP OVP-other 5: Number and percentage of adult women (20-49) reached with the defined service package
YP-other 1: Number and percentage of young girls (10-14) reached with the defined service package
YP-other 2: Number of follow up contacts with young girls (10-14)
KP SW-other 5: Number of follow up contacts with truck drivers
KP MSM-other 2: Number of follow up contacts with MSM
KP SW-other 2: Number of female sex workers tested
DOTS-other 3: Number of contacts of new smear positive TB cases at household level referred to the health facility for screening
KP MSM-other 1: Number and percentage of MSM Newly reached with HIV prevention programmes - using defined package of services
KP OVP-other 6: Number of Adult women (20-49) tested for HIV
KP OVP-other 4: Number of follow up contacts with company employees
DOTS-other 1: Percentage of bacteriologically confirmed new TB cases successfully treated (cured plus completed treatment) during a specified period on community DOT
KP OVP-other 2: Number and percentage of miners tested
DOTS-other 2: Number of TB patients (new and retreatment cases) enrolled in community DOTs
KP MSM-other 3: Number and percentage of MSM tested
